name: Hero's Return
description:
The hero finally returns after being sealed for thousands of years by the demon lord. He fights his way through the dungeon unleashing hell on his enemies and hoping to save the cat princess from the demon lord. 

System Requirements

MINIMUM:

  • OS: Windows 7+, Vista, XP
  • Processor: 1.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9+ level Graphics Card 
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
